author: Reuters Editorial
title: Techfinancials Plans To Sell MarketFinancials Limited
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Techfinancials Inc:
* STRATEGY IS TO CEASE ANY B2C OPERATION IN EU AND TO FOCUS ONLY ON B2C TRADING IN ASIA PACIFIC REGION VIA ITS JOINT VENTURE, DRAGONFINANCIALS​
* ‍TECHFINANCIALS PLANS TO SELL MF, ALONG WITH ITS LICENSE * ‍MF HAS TERMINATED ITS MARKET MAKER SERVICES WITH BOT, WHICH WAS ITS ONLY SOURCE OF INCOME​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
